About Skills Projects Contact

About Me

Mena Eldeeb

I am a student at Al-Azhar University, Faculty of Engineering, Department of Computer Systems and Engineering. I have knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C++. I’m also interested in problem solving and enjoy practicing it regularly. In my free time, I love reading books and exploring new ideas.
